mean_cn: n. 联盟；同盟；盟约；盟国；同盟者；类同
mean_en: a group of people, countries, etc. that are joined together in order to achieve something that they all want
word_etyma: all(y)结盟 + i + ance名词后缀 → alliance 结盟
sentence: The two political parties contracted an alliance against the Japanese army.
sentence_trans: 两个政党结成联盟，共同抵抗日军。
